text:
Hello,
Does anyone know a way to edit the theme style fields visually?
Like we do for the modules fields.

Currently there is no visual editor for theme fields.

That said the fields.json for a theme and module work the same.

You could theoretically use the visual editor to create fields within a module, then move that fields.json to the theme level.

Note not all module fields are available at the theme level. see the module field types documentation to identify which fields are available.

Thank you.
That's what I'm doing at the moment, I tested it out of curiosity and it worked :smile:
I'm just having difficulties when my json has more than a 4-level group.
It seems that the modules do not allow it, but it is possible to use it in the json theme.
